body:
So would this just be changing const.go [here](https://github.com/golang/go/blob/master/src/cmd/compile/internal/gc/const.go#L836) and [here](https://github.com/golang/go/blob/master/src/cmd/compile/internal/gc/const.go#L854) to also check that the kind of both nodes is also not `TINTER`?
cc: @pbiggar @kgibilterra
